titleStmt.title: The opening of heauen gates, or The ready way to euerlasting life Deliuered in a most familier dialogue, betweene reason and religion, touching predestination, Gods word, and mans free-will, to the vnderstanding of the weakest capacitie, and the confirming of the more strong. By Arthur Dent, preacher of the word of God, at South-Shoobery in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Dent, Arthur, d. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By G. Eld] for Iohn Wright, and are to bee sold at his shoppe at Christ-Church gate,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The way to euerlasting life.
Imperfect; pages stained and tightly bound with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in Dr. Williams's Library.
